Class ScanPackagesOption

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jboss.windup.config.AbstractWindupConfigurationOption

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WindupConfigurationOption

    public class ScanPackagesOption
extends AbstractWindupConfigurationOption
    Indicates the Java packages for Windup to scan.

    jsightler
